Bash(ruby -e '
require ""xcodeproj""

project_path = ""Manuscript.xcodeproj""
project = Xcodeproj::Project.open\(project_path\)

# Find the manuscript target
target = project.targets.find { |t| t.name == ""manuscript"" }

# Find the Models group
models_group = project.main_group.find_subpath\(""Manuscript/Models"", true\)

# Add WritingHistory.swift
writing_history_path = ""Manuscript/Models/WritingHistory.swift""
if !models_group.files.any? { |f| f.path == ""WritingHistory.swift"" }
  file_ref = models_group.new_file\(writing_history_path\)
  target.source_build_phase.add_file_reference\(file_ref\)
  puts ""Added WritingHistory.swift""
end

# Find the Components group
components_group = project.main_group.find_subpath\(""Manuscript/Views/Components"", true\)

# Add WritingHistoryView.swift
writing_history_view_path = ""Manuscript/Views/Components/WritingHistoryView.swift""
if !components_group.files.any? { |f| f.path == ""WritingHistoryView.swift"" }
  file_ref = components_group.new_file\(writing_history_view_path\)
  target.source_build_phase.add_file_reference\(file_ref\)
  puts ""Added WritingHistoryView.swift""
end

project.save
puts ""Project saved""
')
